trends: There has been one other sighting in Nevada
There were no other sightings in Nevada on or around November 1st 2008
divs: sighting detailsi was driving a friends house for a late halloween party\birthday. as i was going down hwy1778 in nevada,tx i saw this light pattern as i was driving. it was in a fixed position really high up between the moon which was only 1\4 illuminated and a star. i watched the object as i drove slowly for a few min.s until i realized that i had missed my turn. i pulled into a driveway to turn around and stopped. trying to get a better look at the object as well and it was just gone. only moments had passed since i took my eyes off the unidentified object and pulling over. after i parked i looked everywhere but i couldn't find it in the sky.
Summary: 3-4 white lights on the 2 sides I could see. And a much larger red light in the center or near center. And the space in between the lighs seemed to be almost darker than the sky.
